subject: Re: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.
msgSnippet: If I will build mockobjects above the HttpServletResponse, HttpServeltRequest, HttpSession? ... From: Steve Freeman To: junit@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday,
messageBody:
If I will build mockobjects above the HttpServletResponse, HttpServeltRequest, HttpSession?
----- Original Message -----
From: Steve Freeman
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2001 5:00 PM
Subject: Re: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.

You might take a look at the Mock Object library at www.mockobjects.com

----- Original Message -----
From: FrankSun
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2001 8:31 AM
Subject: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.


For our project is base on Servlet&Jsp tech, and we want to unit test out class.
When a class use HttpServletRequest & HttpServetResponse object, and I test it not under the real enginee(tomcat).How to construct a request and response and session?

Thx a lot.
